definition: station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: One aspect of Japanese culture has already been embraced by the orbital space community -- its food.
sentences.chinese: 日本文化中食物這個方面已經在太空站中十分歡迎。

sentences.english: Bstronauts have been to the space station. They returned last week.
sentences.chinese: 航宇員們已去過太空站了，上週歸來的。

sentences.english: Astronauts and cosmonauts have stayed and worked here for long periods of time before returning to Earth.
sentences.chinese: 美國和蘇聯的太空人都曾在太空站上停留很長的時間。

sentences.english: They have satellites in space that can take pictures of your license plate.
sentences.chinese: 太空站裏的衛星甚至可以拍到你的汽車拍照。

sentences.english: In the meantime, shuttle missions will focus on assembling the International Space Station.
sentences.chinese: 同時，太空梭任務將會專門用在裝設國際太空站上。

sentences.english: The mission had to be scrubbed, however, because of problems aboard the space station.
sentences.chinese: 可是，由於太空站上的問題，這一使命只好取消。

sentences.english: At the moment, the Soyuz is the only way to get astronauts to and from the station.
sentences.chinese: 到那時，聯盟號是宇航員離開國際太空站的唯一方法。

sentences.english: On average, mission controllers move the station once a year.
sentences.chinese: 平均而言，任務控制員每年須這樣移動太空站一次。

sentences.english: The first section of the station was placed in orbit in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 太空站首段於1998年進入太空軌道。

sentences.english: It is also the longest continually staffed space station in history.
sentences.chinese: 這也是史上運作最久的非無人太空站。

sentences.english: A pair of Chinese astronauts have returned from a month-long stay aboard the country's space station.
sentences.chinese: 兩名中國航天員在太空站上呆一個月後安全返回。

sentences.english: Life on an Antarctica stations is hard. It is like life on a space station.
sentences.chinese: 考察站的生活非常艱苦，就像在太空站一樣。

sentences.english: Preparing for even a space-station or lunar mission takes several years.
sentences.chinese: 爲完成一個太空站或者月球計劃需要準備數年時間。

sentences.english: China is developing its first full-fledged space station, called Tiangong(Heavenly Palace).
sentences.chinese: 目前中國正在開發其第一座成熟的太空站，名曰天宮。

sentences.english: They ate canned food similar to that offered on the International Space Station.
sentences.chinese: 他們喫着類似供應給國際太空站的罐頭食品。

definition: moon landing/to land on the moon
